page.title: 02Farming
page.content:
{FORESTRY { This is the year of a forester who works in the woods in this block:
{JANUARY:}Start ploughing for planting trees. {FEBUARY:}Draining ground for planting. {MARCH :}Start to plant saplings in ploughed area. {APRIL :}Still planting and spraying weedkiller. {MAY :}Still spraying weedkiller. {JUNE :}Now hand weeding and cutting scrub. {JULY :}Start to weed very heavily. {AUG-SEP:}Spraying scrub.Weeding. {OCT-NOV:}Cutting christmas trees. {DECEMBR:}Draining and scrub cutting. Thinning and felling are continuous as time permits throughout the year. {see page three for a forester's day.}
